translation.en: [lip-synching] ♪ Well, he walked up to me And he asked me if I wanted to dance ♪
♪ He looked kinda nice And so I said I might take a chance ♪
translation.zh:
‎他看起来好帅
‎我就想或许我可以尝试一下

translation.en: ♪ I didn't know just what to do ♪
♪ So I whispered, "I love you" ♪
♪ He said that he loved me too And then he kissed me ♪
translation.zh: ‎他说他也爱我 然后亲吻了我

translation.en: ♪ Then he asked me to be his bride ♪
♪ And always be right by his side ♪
♪ I felt so happy I almost cried And then he kissed me ♪
translation.zh:
‎我几乎要兴奋地落泪
‎然后他亲吻了我

translation.en: Adventures in Babysitting?
Seriously, Lara Jean?
Now is not the time to be fantasizing about living in an '80s movie.
translation.zh:
‎现在不是幻想自己生活在
‎20世纪80年代电影里的时候

translation.en: Except for today, it's different because it's not a fantasy.
translation.zh:
‎除了今天 今天不一样
‎因为它不是幻想

translation.en: This is my real life.
Don't I look different to you?
Um...
No.
Yeah, I don't see it.
How?
Like someone that has a boyfriend would look.
translation.zh: ‎就是有了男朋友的人看起来的样子

translation.en: You look like he's gonna be here soon and you haven't started getting ready.
translation.zh:
‎你看起来像是他马上就要来了
‎而你一点都没准备的样子

translation.en: Have you even showered?
Get out.
[sniffs] I'm gonna take a shower.
[Lara Jean] People say fairy tales aren't real.
-But sometimes... -[doorbell rings]
...happily ever after is for real.
I've been thinking about this moment since I started reading romance novels.
translation.zh:
‎从我开始读言情小说起
‎就一直在期盼这一刻

translation.en: My very first date.
How do I look?
Perfect.
You look fantastic, honey.
translation.zh: ‎你看起来非常美 亲爱的

translation.en: Okay.
Hi.
Hey.
What's up?
-Nothing much. -No?
Got you something.
-Oh, thank you. -Oh, hey, Kitty.
This is for you. Gerbera daisies are my favorite.
translation.zh:
‎-这是送你的
‎-非洲雏菊是我的最爱

translation.en: What restaurant did you pick? 'Cause I know some of the best.
translation.zh:
‎-科维医生
‎-你选了哪家餐厅？ ‎因为我知道一些不错的餐厅

translation.en: Okay, Dad... here. Put these in water. Go.
translation.zh: ‎爸爸？给 把花放水里 快去

translation.en: Say it out loud. Eleven o'clock?
Eleven o'clock.
Okay, have fun.
Not too much fun.
Bye.
My gosh, I've never been to Cardona's.
translation.zh: ‎我的天 我从未来过卡多纳餐厅

translation.en: [Peter chuckles] It's a good place.
-[Lara Jean] I'm so excited. -Yeah?
-[Lara Jean] This is good. Yeah! -[laughing] I think you're gonna like it.
translation.zh:
‎这里真好 是的！ ‎-我就知道你会喜欢这里
‎-我的天 这里真美

translation.en: -[Lara Jean] It's so beautiful. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
‎-我就知道你会喜欢这里
‎-我的天 这里真美

translation.en: -For the signorina. -Thank you.
-And the signor. -Grazie.
Wow, they have big menus here.
The bigger the menu, the fancier the restaurant. Everybody knows that.
translation.zh:
‎菜单越长 餐厅越高档
‎这道理谁都懂

translation.en: It's actually a two-fork restaurant.
translation.zh: ‎这家餐厅其实常备两把叉子

translation.en: They give you the second one just in case you knock the first one off the table.
translation.zh:
‎他们会多放一把
‎以防你不小心把第一把叉子掉地上了

translation.en: No, that's not... that's not it.
-That's what it is. -No, it's not.
Watch. You ready?
translation.zh:
‎-看好了 准备好了吗？
‎-别这样

translation.en: -Peter, stop. That's so embarrassing. -[Peter] Oh, my God. What's happening?
translation.zh:
‎彼得 别这样 这也太丢人了 ‎-怎么回事？
‎-为什么…

translation.en: -[fork clattering] -Peter.
It's a good thing I have my backup.
This is my first date.
I've never been a girlfriend before.
I hope I'm good at it.
-Hey. -Hmm? Give me your keys.
Oh, you really wanna drive?
I'm a good driver now!
I have a fear of driving in the snow, but guess what?
translation.zh:
‎我害怕下雪的时候开车
‎但你猜怎么着？

translation.en: [singsong] It's not snowing.
-Okay, fine. Just please don't kill us. -Yes!
translation.zh:
‎-好吧 那就依你 千万别害死我们
‎-太好了！

translation.en: Please?
[Peter] How did you know about this?
[Lara Jean] I have my ways.
-Okay, you write a wish... -[Peter] Mm-hmm. and then you send it into the sky.
translation.zh:
‎好的 你在上面写下心愿
‎然后把孔明灯放到天空中

translation.en: -That's not a wish. -What do you mean?
It's not a wish. It's happening right now, so it can't be a wish.
translation.zh:
‎那不是心愿 它已经变成现实了
‎所以不可能是心愿

translation.en: -What? -What?
What's up?
I just don't want this to end.
You're thinking about us ending right now?
translation.zh: ‎你现在在想着我们分手的事？

translation.en: [laughs] It's just a thought that popped in my head, okay? Just...
translation.zh:
‎就是突然闪现在我脑子里的一个念头
‎好吗？就是…

translation.en: Well, tell that thought to get out of your head!
translation.zh: ‎那就快让那个念头离开你的脑子！

translation.en: You can't think about us breaking up on our first date.
translation.zh:
‎我们才第一次约会
‎你不能想分手这种事

translation.en: I just don't want us to break each other's hearts.
translation.zh: ‎我只希望我们不会让彼此伤心

translation.en: I promise I am not going to break your heart.
I promise not to break your heart.
-Do you love it? -I do.
-Look at that! That's awesome. -You have really great handwriting.
We can do it.
-[Peter] You got it. Yes! -Whoo!
Let it fill up.
That's cool.
-Oh, my gosh! -[Peter] There it goes.
We did it. It's so beautiful.
-You can still see our initials. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
‎现在所有人都能看到我们
‎名字的首字母了

translation.en: I don't think I'm ever going to get used to how deep your car is.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道自己以后能不能适应
‎你车子的高度

translation.en: -[Peter laughing] It's a bit... -It's so tall.
It is a pretty, pretty tall wagon.
translation.zh: ‎它是辆很漂亮 很高的马车

translation.en: When I get down, I feel like I'm falling.
translation.zh: ‎我每次下车都感觉自己要摔下来

translation.en: Then you should wait. I'll come around and catch you on the other side.
translation.zh: ‎那你应该等着 我会过来接住你

translation.en: -What? -So...
how was your first date?
And tell me like it wasn't me who took you.
translation.zh: ‎说出你真实的想法 就当不是我问的

translation.en: It was...
perfect.
-Yeah? -Mm-hmm.
Okay, good night.
Okay. Good night.
Good night.
[Margot on phone] Flip the bigger part in your right hand over the smaller part in your left hand.
translation.zh:
‎把你右手里长的那端
‎压在左手短的那端上面

translation.en: Are you sure we have to dress up like this?
translation.zh: ‎你确定我们非得穿成这样吗？

translation.en: You know the other kids aren't going to.
translation.zh: ‎你知道其他孩子都不会这么穿的

translation.en: Okay, we're doing it, Kitty. It's what Dad wants.
translation.zh: ‎行了 我们必须穿 爸爸想让我们穿

translation.en: [Margot] Aw, you guys look amazing. I love Korean New Year.
translation.zh: ‎你们看起来真美 我好爱韩国新年

translation.en: I really wish I was there.
[Kitty] Yeah, we do, too.
-I'm gonna send you a gazillion pictures. -[Dan] It's almost time!
translation.zh:
‎-我会给你发很多照片的
‎-到时间了！

translation.en: We gotta go!
My girls.
Oh, no. Here it comes.
Like two beautiful little roses.
Is that Margot?
Honey, I wish you were here.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 我真希望你在这里

translation.en: I do, too.
-I love you guys. -Bye.
I did it.
Yeah, I didn't think you could.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我都不知道你会成功

translation.en: Good morning. You guys look great.
-Thanks! -Here you go, Doc.
Thanks, Jasmine.
Now, don't you feel left out you didn't wear your hanbok?
translation.zh:
‎你没穿韩服
‎不觉得自己被忽略了吗？

translation.en: [flatly] Yes, Mom. Beyond devastated.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 妈 我现在超级崩溃

translation.en: Thank you.
-[man] Want a beer, Dan? -[Dan] Yeah, why not?
translation.zh:
‎-喝啤酒吗 爸？
‎-好啊 有何不可？

translation.en: [Carrie] So, Dan, are you dating anyone?
-[Grandma] Carrie! -[Carrie] It's just a question!
That doesn't mean you have to stay single forever.
translation.zh: ‎但这并不意味着你要一辈子单身

translation.en: [Lara Jean] My dad says it's important for us to keep our Korean heritage alive.
translation.zh:
‎我爸爸说很有必要传承
‎我们的朝鲜传统

translation.en: But I know the real reason we make such a big effort on the holidays
translation.zh:
‎但我知道我们之所以
‎在节日的时候这么大费周章

translation.en: is because being around her family makes him feel closer to my mom.
translation.zh:
‎是因为跟她的家人在一起
‎会让他觉得跟我妈妈很亲近

translation.en: So you have a boyfriend?
No offense or anything,
but I always thought you were a "no dating till college" type girl.
translation.zh:
‎但我一直以为你是那种
‎会在上大学后才交男朋友的女生

translation.en: His name is Peter, and he wouldn't be dating Lara Jean if it wasn't for me,
translation.zh:
‎他叫彼得 要不是多亏我 ‎他根本不会跟拉拉简约会
‎因为他根本就不知道她的存在

translation.en: 'cause he didn't even know she existed,
translation.zh:
‎他根本不会跟拉拉简约会
‎因为他根本就不知道她的存在

translation.en: but I mailed a secret love letter that she wrote for him--
translation.zh:
‎但我帮她寄出了一封
‎她写给他的秘密情书

translation.en: Well, technically, she wrote five.
Anyway, they started fake dating to make his ex-girlfriend jealous,
translation.zh:
‎总之 他们开始假装约会
‎好让他前女友吃醋

translation.en: and to cover up her real crush,
translation.zh: ‎也为了掩饰她对他真正的喜欢

translation.en: but everything got weird and they started real dating,
translation.zh:
‎但后来一切变得奇怪
‎他们开始真正地约会

translation.en: and now they're real boyfriend and real girlfriend and they are adorable.
translation.zh:
‎现在他们是真正的恋人关系
‎而且他们超级可爱

translation.en: Cute story.
A little PG-13, but cute.
translation.zh: ‎有点像13岁小孩做的事 但很可爱

translation.en: Show Haven a picture of him.
Shut up. This is your boyfriend?
translation.zh: ‎闭嘴 他就是你男朋友吗？

translation.en: Yeah, why?
Dude, I hate to be the one to tell you this,
translation.zh: ‎伙计 这话我实在不想说

translation.en: but I saw a video of him and some girl doing it in a hot tub.
translation.zh:
‎但我看到过一段他跟某个女孩
‎在浴缸里做爱的视频

translation.en: Yeah, um... that was me.
But it's not what you think. We were just making out.
translation.zh: ‎但不是你想的那样 我们只是在亲热

translation.en: That's...
cool, actually.
I want some ice cream. You want some?
translation.zh: ‎我要吃冰激凌 你们吃吗？

translation.en: -Sure. -Sure.
[Dan] That's for you.
Thanks.
When Kitty mailed my love letters, I thought my life was over.
translation.zh:
‎基蒂把我的情书寄出去之后
‎我以为自己这辈子都完了

translation.en: For weeks, I prayed John Ambrose's letter had gotten lost in the mail.
translation.zh:
‎我好几周都祈祷寄给
‎约翰安布罗斯的信被邮局弄丢了

translation.en: And when I never heard anything back, I thought the nightmare was over.
translation.zh:
‎我没有收到任何回复
‎还以为噩梦结束了

translation.en: But, I guess it wasn't.
[John Ambrose] Dear Lara Jean,
I couldn't believe when I opened that letter and it was from you. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎我打开信后 发现是你寄来的
‎惊讶了好半天

translation.en: Wow. It's been, what, five years since we've seen each other?
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我们应该有五年没见面了吧？

translation.en: Not that I'm mad or anything. I was so happy to get it.
translation.zh: ‎我没有生气 我很高兴收到你的来信

translation.en: I can't believe how mature you were at 11.
translation.zh:
‎你11岁的时候就很成熟
‎我觉得你很了不起

translation.en: God, when I was 11, my mom was still putting out snacks for me after school,
translation.zh:
‎老天 我11岁的时候
‎我妈在我下学后还给我做零食呢

translation.en: but here you were with all these complex thoughts and emotions.
translation.zh:
‎但你当时已经有很多
‎复杂的想法和情绪了

translation.en: It's crazy.
Reading it reminded me of that time that we both got locked out after school.
translation.zh:
‎读信的时候让我想起
‎我们有次下学后不能回家的事

translation.en: -Remember that? -[wind chime jingling]
We went to the Robertson's treehouse and read Harry Potter until it got dark.
translation.zh:
‎我们去了罗伯森家的树屋
‎在那里读《哈利波特》 一直到天黑

translation.en: If I'd written you a love letter back then,
translation.zh:
‎如果当时的我给你写情书
‎我很确定

translation.en: I'm pretty sure it would've just said something like, um,
"I liked reading with you.
You're really pretty."
But your letter was so much more than that.
translation.zh: ‎但你的信对我来说意义重大

translation.en: I just have one question: Why send it now?
translation.zh:
‎我只有一个问题：
‎为什么现在才给我寄信？

translation.en: Whatever the reason, I'm really glad I got to read it.
translation.zh:
‎不管原因是什么
‎我还是很开心你写了信来

translation.en: Yours, John Ambrose.
[Lara Jean] Oh, my God.
John Ambrose McClaren just wrote me a letter.
translation.zh:
‎约翰安布罗斯麦克拉伦
‎给我写了一封信

translation.en: Wait, does this mean he liked me in sixth grade, too?
translation.zh:
‎等一下 这说明六年级的时候
‎他也喜欢我吗？

translation.en: Does he like me now?
Okay. Calm down.
It's not a spontaneous love letter or anything.
translation.zh: ‎这不是一封一时冲动写下的情书

translation.en: It's more like a thank-you card.
There's no need to respond.
But... wouldn't it be rude not to respond?
translation.zh:
‎可是 要是不回复
‎是不是有点不礼貌？

translation.en: It would definitely be inconsiderate, so I respond.
translation.zh: ‎不回复肯定欠妥 所以我得回复

translation.en: But, in a friendly way. Just be, like, polite.
translation.zh:
‎但就像朋友之间的通信一样
‎就客气一下

translation.en: Thank him for his letter and move on.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢他回信 然后这件事翻篇

translation.en: Dear John Ambrose,
I hope this letter finds you well.
Have you continued your interest in politics and diplomacy?
translation.zh: ‎你现在还对政治和外交感兴趣吗？

translation.en: I'm sure you're even more smart, considerate, and adorable--
translation.zh:
‎我肯定你现在
‎更聪明、体贴和可爱了…

translation.en: What am I saying?
I can't say that.
Dear John Ambrose,
What lovely penmanship you have.
When I saw your name on the envelope, my heart skipped a beat, and then I--
translation.zh:
‎我看到信封上你的名字时
‎心脏几乎停跳了一拍 然后我…

translation.en: [groans] I am so lame.
Dear John Ambrose,
First of all, thank you for writing me back.
It's nice to be in touch after so long.
translation.zh:
‎这么久之后 能再次跟你取得联系
‎真是太好了

translation.en: I do remember that day in the treehouse reading until it was dark.
translation.zh:
‎我确实还记得那天
‎我们在树屋里读书到天黑的事

translation.en: You said you were House Hufflepuff, and that was my house, too,
translation.zh:
‎你说你是赫奇帕奇学院的
‎我也是那个学院的

translation.en: and I thought maybe that was a sign that we were meant to be.
translation.zh:
‎我想 这或许是个暗示
‎我们注定要在一起

translation.en: Oh, my God.
I cannot do this.
Do I have to tell Peter about this?
[woman on PA] All juniors, please report to the cafeteria to choose your spring service commitments.
translation.zh:
‎所有高三学生请前往餐厅
‎选择春季服务项目

translation.en: [chuckling] 'Sup, Covey?
-Ready? -Always.
-What is going on in that head of yours? -What do you mean?
Uh, snickerdoodles. They're your pensive bake.
translation.zh:
‎肉桂饼干 你有心事时
‎都会做这种饼干

translation.en: -How do you know that? -I dunno. Maybe from...
translation.zh:
‎-你怎么知道？
‎-我说不好 或许是从…

translation.en: that picture you posted on Instagram a few months ago, #pensivebake?
translation.zh:
‎你几个月前在照片墙上发布的那张
‎标签为心事饼干的照片上知道的？

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, yeah. That's when I didn't know what was going on between us.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 那次是因为
‎我不知道我们之间是怎么回事

translation.en: That's not what's going on now, I hope.
Do you remember when Kitty sent out my love letters?
translation.zh:
‎你还记得基蒂
‎把我的情书寄出去的事吗？

translation.en: Is that a serious question?
[chuckles] No, of course you remember. But...
translation.zh: ‎不 你当然记得 但是

translation.en: remember when you asked me who got the other ones,
translation.zh:
‎你还记得你问我
‎都有谁收到了那些信

translation.en: and I said the last one went to someone from Model UN?
translation.zh:
‎我说最后一封寄给了一个
‎进入了模拟联合国的男孩吗？

translation.en: Mm-hmm.
-It was John Ambrose McClaren. -No shit.
translation.zh:
‎-那人是约翰安布罗斯麦克拉伦
‎-不是吧

translation.en: McClaren? That was my boy.
translation.zh: ‎麦克拉伦？他曾是我的好朋友

translation.en: Well, he wrote me back.
He wrote you-- Like, an actual... Like, an actual letter? Or an email? Or...
translation.zh:
‎他真的给你写了…一封信吗？
‎还是写了电子邮件？还是…

translation.en: Yeah, like a real letter in the mail.
translation.zh: ‎对 那种邮寄过来的信件

translation.en: Huh.
He say anything about me?
-Like what? -I dunno.
Like, "Um, how's Kavinsky? How's he doing?"
translation.zh:
‎比如说“凯文斯基怎么样？
‎他还好吗？”

translation.en: [chuckling] Nope.
Did you write him back?
Not yet.
Oh, so you're, like... you're, like, going to, planning on it?
I probably should.
-Why? -Because it'd be rude not to.
translation.zh:
‎-为什么？
‎-因为不回信的话显得很没礼貌

translation.en: Then, I don't know why you're telling me all this.
translation.zh:
‎那我就不明白你为何
‎告诉我这件事了

translation.en: Are you asking for my permission or...
No, I just thought it was gonna be strange if I didn't tell you.
translation.zh:
‎不 我就是觉得如果不告诉你的话
‎会比较奇怪

translation.en: Please choose your service commitments wisely.
You will be representing Adler at your chosen post.
translation.zh:
‎你们在所选的岗位上
‎代表的可是艾德勒高中

translation.en: Expand your horizons, people! Thank you.
[Trevor] Yo! K, what's up, big boy?
-'Sup, LJ? -Hi, Trevor.
translation.zh:
‎-你好 拉拉简
‎-你好 特雷弗

translation.en: Yo, bro, so check it out.
We already snagged six spots at Oakwood Market.
translation.zh:
‎我们已经拿下了
‎奥克伍德超市的六个岗位

translation.en: Everybody's in, done deal.
translation.zh:
‎-大家都报名 然后一切万事大吉
‎-走吧

translation.en: Come on. Covey, let us sign you up.
-Oakwood? -Yes.
I kinda thought we'd volunteer at Belleview together.
translation.zh:
‎我还以为我们会一起去
‎贝尔维尤当志愿者

translation.en: Okay, I'm out. Uh, enjoy your fight.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我不管了 你们自己定吧

translation.en: Come on, let me sign you up. It'll be fun.
translation.zh: ‎走吧 我们去报名 会很好玩的

translation.en: [sighing] Margot volunteered at Belleview.
translation.zh: ‎玛戈特曾在贝尔维尤当志愿者

translation.en: And, besides, Belleview looks better on college applications.
translation.zh:
‎而且 申请大学的时候
‎贝尔维尤能让我有点优势

translation.en: I dunno, it was just the guys-- We kind of decided that
translation.zh:
‎我说不好 就是我那些朋友…
‎我们算是说好了

translation.en: we were gonna do Oakwood when training started. But, um...
translation.zh:
‎等训练开始后
‎我们要一起去奥克伍德

translation.en: You should go. I'm gonna sign up for Belleview.
translation.zh: ‎那你去吧 我去贝尔维尤那里报名

translation.en: -Are you sure -Mm-hmm.
Go sign up. Seriously.
Okay, well, let me make it up to you.
Let's meet after practice for coffee.
translation.zh: ‎等我训练结束后 我们一起喝咖啡

translation.en: Five o'clock.
Sounds good.
-It's epic. -You're so lazy! It's epic.
Come on, you guys. Come sign up for Belleview with me.
translation.zh:
‎好了 你们俩
‎我们一起去贝尔维尤那里报名吧

translation.en: Playing Connect 4 with a bunch of octagenarians? No, thanks.
translation.zh:
‎跟一群80多岁的老人玩四子棋？
‎不了 谢谢

translation.en: Oh, hell nah.
Nah, I already signed up for the soup kitchen.
translation.zh: ‎不 我已经在汤厨房那里报名了

translation.en: Oh, I wrote a proposal for a new program.
Rescue Animal Welfare.
Chris, this is you hanging out with your dog at home.
translation.zh:
‎克里斯 这明明就是在家
‎跟你的狗狗玩

translation.en: Yeah, a dog who's a rescue.
[chuckling] It's genius, right?
No, that is genius. I'm with you on this one, Chris.
translation.zh: ‎对 是很妙 这件事上我挺你 克里斯

translation.en: [Gen] Of course you would do Belleview.
You're so predictable, Lara Jean. It's quite adorable.
translation.zh: ‎拉拉简 你真是太好猜了 真好玩

translation.en: -I guess you're doing Oakwood. -Sorting through half-rotten produce?
translation.zh:
‎-我猜你在奥克伍德那里报了名
‎-归类半腐烂的农产品？

translation.en: No, thank you.
So, I saw on your story that you went to Cardona's this weekend?
translation.zh:
‎我看到你在社交媒体上的照片了
‎你这周末去了卡多纳餐厅？

translation.en: Classic Kavinsky.
You know, by the time we broke up, I actually thought I was gonna die
translation.zh:
‎其实 我们分手时
‎我还以为自己会死掉

translation.en: if I had any more cacio e pepe.
translation.zh: ‎如果我吃了更多芝士胡椒意大利面

translation.en: Pro tip: If you do want to fit into your jeans come summer,
translation.zh:
‎给你一条专业建议：如果你想在
‎明年夏天还能穿上之前的牛仔裤

translation.en: you should probably start ordering salad.
translation.zh: ‎或许你点菜时应该点沙拉了

translation.en: [Lara Jean] When Peter and I got together,
I didn't expect to feel so insecure about his past relationship with Gen.
translation.zh:
‎我从未想到自己会因为他之前
‎跟吉的恋情而有不安全感

translation.en: But for every first I was having with him,
he'd already had his with her.
[girl] Sorry, are you using this chair?
Yeah. It's for my boyfriend. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: ‎用 这是留给我男朋友的 抱歉

translation.en: You don't need this chair, do you, Lara Jean?
translation.zh: ‎拉拉简 你不用这把椅子吧？

translation.en: I do.
Peter's on his way.
-He's just running a little behind. -Is he?
-Is anybody using this chair? -Yes. My boyfriend, he's coming.
translation.zh:
‎-有人用这把椅子吗？
‎-对 我男朋友 他马上过来

translation.en: Okay, I am so sorry, Covey. I--
translation.zh: ‎好吧 真的很抱歉 科维 我…

translation.en: Coach made us run the bleachers until everyone practically puked.
translation.zh:
‎教练让我们绕着露台跑
‎直到所有人都跑吐了

translation.en: Well, you could've let me know.
[stammering] I would've, but he has that rule.
No texting during practice or else you don't start.
translation.zh:
‎训练期间不准发短信
‎否则就不能进入首发阵容

translation.en: I need to play every single game, so it's kind of...
translation.zh: ‎每场比赛我都得上 所以这有点…

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
I should've came up with a better plan that didn't leave you hanging.
translation.zh:
‎我该想出个更好的办法
‎不让你在这里一直干等的

translation.en: Yeah, you should've.
Let's get out of here.
What?
-Call your dad. -What?
Tell him you're gonna be home late.
What? Where are we going?
I'm taking you out.
-Okay. Ah! -Yup. Let's go.
-[Peter] Right now. -Okay, okay, I'm going.
translation.zh:
‎-现在就走
‎-好吧 我跟你走

translation.en: You don't have to lift a finger.
[Peter] Thank you so much, man.
-Ready? -I am.
-Yeah? -Come on, let's go!
Come on.
We are here together at Sizzler.
-Whoo! -Here we go!
-This is your idea! -I know!
I love this date.
-All right, what do you want to do next? -Bumper cars!
translation.zh:
‎-好了 接下来你想玩哪个？
‎-碰碰车！

translation.en: [Peter] I got this. I got it! Come on.
translation.zh: ‎我可以的 加油！我可以的！

translation.en: Come on. Go, go, go, go, go!
-Stop it. Go! -[Peter] Come on!
-Stop, don't. Ow, Peter! -Stop, stop!
translation.zh:
‎-停下 别那样 哎呀 彼得！
‎-快停下！

translation.en: [laughing]
-Go, go! -No, no!
-[bell rings] -Yeah!
Victory is mine!
I win!
-Well done. -Um, excuse me, miss?
Could I get this, please?
Thank you.
-Please watch. -Okay.
-I'm watching. -Okay.
[Lara Jean] It's a funny thing, this relationship stuff.
One moment, things are upside down,
translation.zh: ‎在某一刻 一切都是灰暗的

translation.en: but then, like magic, there's glitter everywhere.
translation.zh:
‎然后突然像有人施了魔法一般
‎一切开始闪闪发光

translation.en: And once it all settles, you're right back in the fairy tale again.
translation.zh:
‎一旦所有问题解决
‎你就又回到童话故事里了

translation.en: [Kitty] Outdoorsy, morning person,
-consistently has good shoe choices. -What are you talking about?
translation.zh:
‎-每次选鞋都很有眼光
‎-你在说什么？

translation.en: Mrs. Rothschild. I think they should date.
translation.zh:
‎罗斯柴尔德夫人
‎我觉得他们应该约会

translation.en: She's divorced, you know.
Happened last year.
Right. Because Dad, who hasn't dated in years,
translation.zh:
‎是啊 因为好多年已经没有跟
‎别人约过会的爸爸

translation.en: is suddenly gonna start dating our neighbor.
translation.zh: ‎突然开始跟我们的邻居约会了

translation.en: Sounds a bit delusional, Kitty.
translation.zh: ‎基蒂 这就是你的幻想吧

translation.en: You also thought I was delusional when I suggested you date Peter.
translation.zh:
‎我建议你跟彼得约会时
‎你也说我是在幻想

translation.en: And, um, how did that one work out?
They just need a little shove.
Kitty.
Leave Dad and Mrs. Rothschild alone.
translation.zh: ‎别管爸爸和罗斯柴尔德夫人的事

translation.en: Okay? I mean it.
She cut down her hedges, Lara Jean. That is a metaphor!
translation.zh:
‎拉拉简 她砍掉了自己家的树篱
‎这是一个暗喻！

translation.en: Are you sure? I can just keep Henry outside.
translation.zh: ‎你确定吗？我可以让亨利在外面等着

translation.en: Can I get him anything? A rack of ribs?
translation.zh:
‎用我给它拿点什么吗？
‎来点肋排如何？

translation.en: [laughs] Yes.
-[Dan] I'll get that number. -Good boy.
Hi.
-Oh, hi. -Hi.
[Lara Jean] Nice to see you, Mrs. Rothschild.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴见到你 罗斯柴尔德夫人

translation.en: Okay. I got Bobby's contact info. Can I text it?
translation.zh:
‎好了 我找到鲍比的联系方式了
‎用我发短信给你吗？

translation.en: [Trina] Yeah, know what? Why don't I just put my number in your phone?
translation.zh:
‎好啊 不如这样吧
‎我直接把我的号码存进你手机里？

translation.en: -[Dan] Oh, okay. -[Trina] Okay.
This guy has got a master green thumb.
-He, uh, gave me some tips on hollyhocks. -Hollyhocks are my favorite.
translation.zh:
‎-他给了我一些关于种植蜀葵的建议
‎-蜀葵是我的最爱

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
[Dan] I find them more rewarding than boring azaleas.
translation.zh:
‎我感觉种蜀葵
‎比种无聊的杜鹃更有成就感

translation.en: [Trina giggling] Exactly.
All right. I should probably go.
It's nice to see you, Mrs. Rothschild.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴见到你 罗斯柴尔德夫人

translation.en: Oh, Trina. Please.
-[Dan clears throat] -Trina.
-Come on. Come on! -Well, I'll walk you out.
Ah... okay.
They're gonna be in love by Valentine's Day!
translation.zh:
‎等到了情人节
‎他们肯定就会坠入爱河！

translation.en: How could you possibly get that from a conversation about gardening?
translation.zh:
‎他们不过是谈了谈园艺的事
‎你怎么就得出了这个结论？

translation.en: Because Dad is not a dog person. Hmm?
[woman] Don't let me make you nervous.
translation.zh: ‎先生 你别因为我而紧张

translation.en: [Lara Jean] Margot loved Belleview because of the people,
translation.zh:
‎玛戈特之所以喜欢贝尔维尤
‎是因为这里的人

translation.en: but there was one person she talked about way more than any of the others.
[man] Hard to beat that!
For most people.
Why that's a Song-Covey if I've ever seen one.
translation.zh: ‎又是一个宋和科维家的孩子

translation.en: You must be Stormy.
And you must be Lara Jean.
Did your sister send you over here to check up on me?
I'm volunteering. Do you know where to find Dorothy?
translation.zh:
‎我是这里的志愿者
‎你知道我能在哪找到多萝西吗？

translation.en: How is Margot enjoying Scotland?
I think she really likes St. Andrews.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得她很喜欢圣安德鲁斯大学

translation.en: Well, I hope she's not just studying over there.
translation.zh: ‎希望她在那里不只是埋头苦读

translation.en: I never had a bad time in Scotland.
translation.zh: ‎我在苏格兰时就没有不开心过

translation.en: That was one of my routes for Pan Am.
translation.zh: ‎我在泛美航空公司时飞过那条线

translation.en: Were you a flight attendant?
A flight attendant?
That is some PC nonsense.
translation.zh: ‎这个破词就是为了政治正确

translation.en: I was a Pan Am stewardess.
We served smoked oysters and caviar and shook gin martinis at 30,000 feet.
translation.zh:
‎我们曾在9000多米的高空上向客人
‎提供熏牡蛎、鱼子酱 调制金马提尼

translation.en: We were the showgirls of the skies.
Come on, I'll give you a tour.
Oh, no, I think I actually have to wait for, uh, Dorothy--
The only thing Dorothy will tell you
is where to find the first aid kit and the bingo supplies.
translation.zh:
‎在哪里能找到急救包
‎和宾果游戏卡

translation.en: If you'd like a real introduction to this place,
translation.zh: ‎如果你想真正熟悉这个地方

translation.en: follow me.
Okay, I'm coming!
This is the crafts room.
And the knitting club.
Why you would form a club to do an activity you can do alone is beyond me.
translation.zh:
‎为什么自己一个人单独就能做的事
‎偏偏要组个小组一起做 真是搞不懂

translation.en: The games room.
Sore losers, they won't even let me play with them anymore.
translation.zh:
‎一群输不起的家伙
‎他们都不让我跟他们一起玩了

translation.en: Bunch of communists.
Communists?
This used to be the breakfast room until Hilda over there decided she had a gift.
translation.zh:
‎这里原本是早餐餐厅
‎直到那边的希尔达觉得自己拥有天赋

translation.en: We can hear you, you know?
But, didn't you know what we were going to say anyway?
translation.zh: ‎可是你早就知道我们会说什么吧？

translation.en: Ah, here's Dorothy.
This is my very dear friend Lara Jean.
translation.zh: ‎这是我非常亲爱的朋友拉拉简

translation.en: She's one of our high school volunteers.
translation.zh: ‎她是从高中来的一个志愿者

translation.en: -Hello. -Hi.
Now, Dorothy,
this one is very special.
So, I want you to apply the same care to her
translation.zh:
‎所以我希望你像调制
‎自己完美的血腥玛丽一样

translation.en: as you do to your excellent Bloody Mary mix.
[chuckling] You make me laugh.
Knock 'em dead, honey.
Thank you.
-Getting a refill. -Make sure you eat your celery!
translation.zh:
‎-我去再接一杯
‎-一定要记得吃芹菜！

translation.en: -Oh, yes. -Yeah. She needs her fiber.
translation.zh:
‎-好的
‎-对 她需要补充纤维素

translation.en: Oh, no, I don't need that. I have you right here.
translation.zh: ‎不 不用给我 我这里有你的资料

translation.en: -Lara Jean Covey. -Yeah.
-That's me. -Welcome.
-We're just waiting for one more. -Oh.
translation.zh:
‎-我们还在等另一位志愿者
‎-是

translation.en: I thought that I was the only one who signed up.
From Adler, yes, but we have a young man from Port Smith. His name is--
translation.zh:
‎没错 艾德勒高中只有你 但还有一个
‎来自史密斯港的年轻人 他叫…

translation.en: John Ambrose McClaren.
Hi, Lara Jean.
Hi-- [screams]
Oh, jeez! Lara Jean!
I'll get the first aid kit.
Are you okay?
Yeah.
Follow my finger.
-Oh. -Yeah.
What are you doing?
I'm making sure you're not concussed.
How can you tell?
[chuckles] I'm gonna ask you some questions.
Okay.
You know who I am?
Someone I sent a love letter to.
translation.zh: ‎一个曾经收到过我情书的人

translation.en: Yeah, that's the one.
And, I'm gonna need that letter back.
translation.zh: ‎对了 你得把那封情书还给我

translation.en: Why?
Oh, you know, I just-- I wrote it a long time ago,
translation.zh:
‎你懂的 我就是…
‎那是我很久之前写的了

translation.en: and I don't necessarily remember what I said, so,
translation.zh: ‎我并不记得自己都写了什么 所以

translation.en: I guess I just wanna know how mortified I should be.
translation.zh: ‎我猜我只是想知道自己该有多羞愧

translation.en: Okay, okay. I will... I'll bring you the letter on one condition.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我会还给你
‎若你答应我一个条件 我就把信带来

translation.en: Okay, you have to return it after you read it.
translation.zh: ‎好的 就是你看完后得再还给我

translation.en: I just, I need proof that someone actually liked me in middle school.
translation.zh:
‎我需要证据证明自己上初中时
‎真的被人喜欢过

translation.en: Are you kidding?
Everyone liked you in middle school.
Uh, I don't... I don't really think that's true.
You know? But even if it was, I--
translation.zh: ‎其实 就算是真的 我…

translation.en: I didn't really care about everyone.
[Dorothy] Okay.
How's the patient?
Uh, she's... she's good. She's embarrassed, but okay.
translation.zh: ‎她没事 就是有点难为情 但没事

translation.en: [exhales] Good. Don't want to get sued again.
translation.zh: ‎很好 我可不想再被起诉

translation.en: You ready to get started?
Come on. We got it. Nice and easy.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 我扶着你 慢慢站起来

translation.en: Good. Nice and slow.
-Okay. -[Lara Jean groans]
I bring it to you, you bring it back to me.
translation.zh: ‎我把信给你带来 但你得再还给我

translation.en: Those are my terms. Take 'em or leave 'em.
translation.zh: ‎这就是我的条件 要么答应 要么拉倒

translation.en: -Deal. -Okay.
-Ready. -Ready.
[Lara Jean] I thought having a boyfriend
meant the mere idea of other boys left your mind completely.
translation.zh: ‎就意味着自己再也不会想着其他男孩

translation.en: And yet, here I was, totally crazy about Peter, but...
translation.zh: ‎但我现在虽然爱彼得爱得疯狂 但是…

translation.en: I couldn't stop replaying my conversation with John Ambrose in my head.
translation.zh:
‎我还是忍不住在脑海里一遍遍回放
‎我和约翰安布罗斯的对话

translation.en: I didn't care about everyone.
[Lara Jean] I didn't want to be thinking about what might have been
translation.zh:
‎我不希望自己去想
‎如果他在初中时收到那封信

translation.en: if he'd gotten that letter in middle school instead of now.
translation.zh: ‎而不是现在 结果会怎样

translation.en: But I was.
So, I have a question.
When you wrote those letters...
who'd you like the most?
You had to have had a favorite.
You couldn't have liked us all the same.
translation.zh: ‎你不可能同样喜欢我们几个

translation.en: One of the letters had to have been a little more intense than the others.
translation.zh:
‎某封信里蕴含的感情
‎一定比其他信里更强烈

translation.en: [Lara Jean] If I was really being honest,
there was one letter that I remember
being a little more intense than the others.
translation.zh:
‎其中蕴含的情感
‎要比其他几封强烈一些

translation.en: It was mine. Right?
[John Ambrose] It was me.
Right?
Are you sure you don't wanna add some glitter? Or maybe some pearls?
translation.zh: ‎你确定不想加点闪光粉？或者珍珠？

translation.en: I don't wanna go nuts, I mean this is our first Valentine's Day, so...
translation.zh:
‎我不想太过
‎毕竟这是我们第一个情人节 所以…

translation.en: [sighs] That's true.
You don't wanna give him something super sweet and heartfelt
translation.zh:
‎你不想送他一样超级甜蜜
‎超级感人的礼物

translation.en: and have him give you something from Rite Aid.
translation.zh:
‎然后让他送你一件
‎得去来德爱药店买的东西

translation.en: Hmm. That would be embarrassing.
You know, that's not gonna get to Margot in time.
translation.zh: ‎你的贺卡不会及时被送到玛戈特那里

translation.en: Well, good thing this one only has to make it across the street.
translation.zh: ‎好在这张贺卡只需被送去街对面就行

translation.en: Aw. You're giving Trina a valentine?
translation.zh: ‎你要给特瑞娜送情人节贺卡？

translation.en: Well, not from me. From Dad.
Did you already forget our conversation about meddling?
translation.zh:
‎你忘了那天我们关于
‎别管闲事的对话了吗？

translation.en: Besides, Dad's not a glitter type of guy.
translation.zh:
‎而且 爸爸也不是
‎那种喜欢闪光粉的人

translation.en: Nor were you a Peter Kavinsky kinda girl till I sprinkled some glitter on it.
translation.zh:
‎在我帮你助力之前
‎凯文斯基也不喜欢你这种女生的

translation.en: Oh, uh-huh, mmm, walk away. Go get your turnovers!
translation.zh:
‎快走开吧！
‎去把你的水果馅饼拿出来！

translation.en: I mean, as one of my success stories,
you'd think you'd be a tad more supportive.
translation.zh: ‎我还以为你会支持一下我呢

translation.en: Get ready, Lara Jean. Last year, Peter sent one to Gen every period.
translation.zh:
‎做好准备 拉拉简 去年吉每次来例假
‎彼得都派人去给她唱歌

translation.en: All right. Let's get this over with.
Oh, my God.
I'm fired up!
-Whoa! -[Trevor laughs]
Dude, you got spammed!
Oh, my God. I don't even know who half of these people are.
translation.zh: ‎我的天 写信的人 半数我都不认识

translation.en: Uh, it's the girls' soccer team.
Is it Kelly? Yeah, she's nice to me. I like her.
translation.zh: ‎是凯莉吗？ ‎是 她对我挺好的 我喜欢她

translation.en: Hey.
Don't lose sleep over the Kavinsky fan club.
translation.zh: ‎千万别为凯文斯基的粉丝团烦心

translation.en: Okay, you're the one that dethroned Gen without even trying.
translation.zh:
‎好的 毕竟你不费吹灰之力
‎就把吉从他身边赶走了

translation.en: I guess. Just sometimes I wish my boyfriend was a little bit...
translation.zh:
‎大概是吧 但有时候
‎我真希望自己的男朋友…

translation.en: more anonymous.
Well, heavy is the head that wears the crown.
I don't want it. Take it back.
translation.zh: ‎我才不想要什么皇冠 还给你

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. This is all you now.
-But I didn't ask for it. -Nah, this is all you. It's tough.
translation.zh:
‎-可我根本不想要
‎-不 皇冠就是你的 不行

translation.en: -Stop. Gross. -It's yours now.
translation.zh:
‎-行了 好恶心
‎-皇冠就是你的

translation.en: [Lucas] Well, tough. Look, I was thinking, all right..
translation.zh: ‎坚强女孩 听着 我在想 好吧…

translation.en: [Peter] Found you.
You found me.
I was looking for my valentine.
Come on.
Where are we going?
You'll see.
So, I figured this is the perfect place to give you this
translation.zh: ‎我觉得这里是送你礼物的完美之地

translation.en: because this is where it all started when you jumped me.
translation.zh:
‎因为你就是在这里把我扑倒
‎然后一切就开始了

translation.en: Okay.
[sighing] It's beautiful.
Um, would you put it on me?
Yeah.
Okay, um...
Stop.
Oh, and, uh, here is your card.
I love it.
One more thing.
Okay.
"The moon never beams without bringing me dreams
translation.zh:
‎“月亮总是发出淡淡的清辉
‎为我带来美梦

translation.en: of beautiful Lara Jean.
And stars never rise, but I feel the bright eyes

Mr. Sawoski's failed green thumb attempt

"Dear John Ambrose,
do you remember the Halloween party at Matt Kaplan's barn?

It's like everyone except me got the cool kid memo that

‎指南写着

I knew it all the way down to my candy red sneakers.
I love you, John Ambrose. I really love you.

I'll always know that once upon a time,

translation.en: my heart was yours."
I cannot believe I wrote that.
I cannot believe he read that.

to jump off a cliff, so...
remember that.

translation.en: Couldn't believe it.
But then she tried to dance with Peter the whole night.
translation.zh:
‎但她整个晚上都在
‎想方设法跟彼得跳舞

translation.en: Even during the slow songs, when I couldn't pretend
translation.zh:
‎即便是在放慢歌的时候
‎那种时候我都不能假装

translation.en: like we were just dancing in a group.
[woman] Hey!
Cut the chitchat.
Call the numbers.
[John Ambrose] I-25.
I can't wait to be at an age
where I'm not expected to think that flip cup is fun.
translation.zh:
‎别人不会期待我觉得
‎翻转杯很好玩的年纪

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, why do you think we're both volunteering
translation.zh:
‎是啊 不然你以为我们为何
‎都报名在这里当志愿者

translation.en: and hanging out with the senior citizens on a Saturday?
translation.zh: ‎周六的时候陪着这些老人呢？

translation.en: Are we lame?
We might be a little bit. I-30.
But, lame in a cool way.
Totally lame in a cool way.
-Yeah. -Are you kidding?
[chuckles] B-2?
Whoo! I got BINGO.
Suck it. [laughs]
So, um, speaking of Peter Kavinsky,
he told me to tell you he says hi.
Oh, cool.
You guys still hang out.
We do, actually.
Is he... is he still like he was in middle school?
What does that mean?
I mean like, okay, at parties and stuff, he would always
translation.zh: ‎我是说 好吧 在派对上 他总会

translation.en: take the last slice of pizza.
And then whenever you tried to call him out on it,
he'd be like, "I'm an athlete."
And that one time, it was my birthday and you made me those amazing
translation.zh:
‎有次我过生日
‎你给我做了一些很好吃的

translation.en: peanut butter chocolate cupcakes, remember those?
translation.zh:
‎花生黄油巧克力杯子蛋糕
‎还记得吗？

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -So good.
And he took the last one of those, too.
But we never even got mad at him, 'cause he's so...
translation.zh: ‎但我们从未生过他的气 因为他太…

translation.en: Peter Kavinsky, you know?
translation.zh: ‎彼得凯文斯基了 你懂吧？

translation.en: Yeah. I do know. Um...
-And-- -Are he and Gen still together?
-Huh? -I mean, they must be,
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-我是说 这是肯定的了

translation.en: since you all still hang out.
No, actually Gen and I aren't really friends anymore
translation.zh: ‎不 其实我和吉已经不是朋友了

translation.en: and she and Peter broke up.
That makes sense. No one really stays together in high school, anyway.
translation.zh:
‎这也说得通
‎反正高中恋情都长不了的

translation.en: Right. And on that note,
-I think I should tell you-- -[Dorothy] Oh!
What a wonderful team you make.
But this is wrong.
All of the bingo stuff goes in the basement.
translation.zh: ‎所有关于宾果的东西都要放到地下室

translation.en: This needs to be cleared out for the garden party.
translation.zh: ‎这里得腾出来举办花园派对

translation.en: I have to go make some prune daiquiris.
translation.zh: ‎我得去调点西梅干台克利酒

translation.en: -Hey, Dorothy! -Dorothy?
Did you know there's a basement?
[John Ambrose] Whoa.
Oh, my gosh.
Oh, there's a bust of Mozart over here. I love his new album.
translation.zh: ‎这里有个莫扎特的半身像 ‎我很喜欢他的新专辑

translation.en: Hey.
Look.
Forget the stupid garden party and the potted ferns. Like...
translation.zh:
‎就别想着破花园派对
‎和盆栽蕨类植物 我觉得…

translation.en: I think we should give the people what they want.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得我们应该满足
‎人们真正的愿望

translation.en: An excuse to dress up and dance like they used to.
translation.zh:
‎一个让他们像过去那样
‎盛装打扮 一起跳舞的理由

translation.en: Yeah?
I think we should bring back the Star Ball.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我们应该重启星辰舞会

translation.en: I think it's crazy that people think all old people wanna do is play bingo.
translation.zh:
‎人们觉得老年人只喜欢玩宾果游戏
‎这想法真是太荒谬了

translation.en: Yeah, totally.
I think it's a great idea.
-Cool. [chuckles] -Although...
to be fair, I do think that old people just really love bingo for some reason.
translation.zh:
‎说实话 我确实认为老年人
‎不知为何真的喜欢玩宾果游戏

translation.en: Yeah.
-Do you know what all this reminds me of? -Hmm?
translation.zh: ‎你知道这让我想起了什么吗？

translation.en: Uh, the time capsule.
Do you remember when we buried it?
translation.zh: ‎你还记得我们什么时候埋的吗？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, it was during one of our pizza parties at the treehouse.
translation.zh:
‎记得 是我们某次在树屋
‎举办披萨派对时埋的

translation.en: The pizza parties...
Man, we had such good times at that treehouse.
translation.zh:
‎老天 我们在树屋度过了
‎很多美好的时光

translation.en: Just hanging, you know?
Reading.
There's something I need to tell you.
What's up?
Um... they are tearing the treehouse down.
Why?
The Robertsons are moving out
and the new couple, they don't have kids, so...
translation.zh:
‎新来的那对夫妇
‎他们没有孩子 所以…

translation.en: The time capsule.
We should dig it up.
And rob future generations of the discovery?
translation.zh: ‎夺走子孙后代发现它的机会吗？ ‎我们的子孙后代会忙着砍伐森林

translation.en: Future generations are gonna have their hands full with deforestation.
translation.zh: ‎我们的子孙后代会忙着砍伐森林

translation.en: Urban overcrowding.
And we'll probably be living underwater at that point, right? [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎到时人类说不定就住在水下了
‎对吧？

translation.en: But it could be fun for us.
What do you think?
Yeah, um, that's a great idea.
And we can invite the other people that were there when we buried it.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以把那些当初见证
‎我们埋下它的人都请来

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah, totally. We'll... We can invite everybody.
translation.zh: ‎没问题 我们可以把所有人都请来

translation.en: It'd be great.
I'll bring the pizza.
Maybe you can make those
peanut butter chocolate cupcakes?
What makes the octopus's pulmonary system unique
translation.zh: ‎章鱼的呼吸系统之所以独特

translation.en: is it has not one, but three hearts.
translation.zh:
‎是因为它不止有一个
‎而是有三个心脏

translation.en: Make an incision underneath the ocellus
and you will see the branchial heart.
The octopus is a mollusk and we will get to see one of those
translation.zh:
‎章鱼是一种软体动物
‎下周我们去波特兰水族馆时

translation.en: during next week's visit to the Portland Aquarium.
-Mm-mmm. -Okay, here. I got this.
So what are you doing this Friday? Are you free?
translation.zh: ‎你这周五有安排吗？有时间吗？

translation.en: Uh, I'm not sure.
Um, why?
Do you remember the time capsule that we buried in middle school?
translation.zh:
‎你还记得我们上初中时
‎埋下的那个时空胶囊吗？

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -We should dig it up.
Just us?
Uh, no, the other people that... that we buried it with.
translation.zh: ‎不 还有其他跟我们一起埋的人

translation.en: -So, Gen? -No.
I'm not inviting Gen. She posted that video of us.
translation.zh:
‎我不会邀请吉的
‎她把我们那个视频发到了网上

translation.en: Well, we don't know for sure that she did that anyway, right?
translation.zh:
‎其实 我们并不确定
‎是不是她发的 对吧？

translation.en: Well, I don't even think she'd come even if we invited her, so...
translation.zh:
‎就算我们邀请她 我觉得她也不会来
‎所以还是算了

translation.en: It would be me, you, Chris,
Trevor, and John Ambrose.
So you... you, um. wrote him back.
Funny story, um...
we're actually volunteering at Belleview together.
translation.zh: ‎其实我们一起在贝尔维尤当志愿者

translation.en: -No way. -Yeah.
-Really? -Mm-hmm.
Did you ask him to volunteer with you?
translation.zh: ‎是你让他跟你一起去那当志愿者吗？

translation.en: -No, I didn't even write him back. -Huh.
translation.zh: ‎不 我都没给他回信 ‎这样啊

translation.en: Jeez, Covey, for a girl who's never had a boyfriend,
translation.zh:
‎老天 科维
‎对一个从未交过男友的女孩来说

translation.en: you sure know how to mess with a guy.
[chuckles softly] Excuse me?
Time capsule. Yeah, let's do it, what the hell?
translation.zh:
‎时空胶囊 好啊 我们去挖
‎这有什么大不了的？

translation.en: We don't know what we'll find, right?
translation.zh: ‎反正又不知道会找到什么 对吧？

translation.en: Cool.
Watch.
-No, no. -Watch it.
-Please, I-- -Watch it.
[Kitty] Chocolate peanut butter cupcakes?
Peter prefers salted caramel.
[John Ambrose] Lara Jean.
[Lara Jean] Hey.
Two pepperoni pizzas! That's probably enough, right?
translation.zh:
‎两个意大利香肠披萨
‎我感觉这或许就够了 对吧？

translation.en: Well, well, well, if it isn't Johnny McClaren!
translation.zh: ‎哎呦 这不是约翰麦克拉伦嘛！

translation.en: [John Ambrose] Peter Kavinsky.
Hey, man.
-Good to see you. -Good to see you.
-How you doing? -Good, you get pizzas?
translation.zh:
‎-你怎么样？
‎-很好 你带了披萨？

translation.en: -What kind? -Yeah, pepperoni, just two pepperoni.
translation.zh:
‎-什么味道的？
‎-就是两个意大利香肠披萨

translation.en: It's the safest.
[Lara Jean] I didn't realize until I saw them standing next to one another
translation.zh: ‎直到看到他俩站在一起 我才意识到

translation.en: what a spectacularly bad idea this was.
Yo! You guys ordered 'za?
God, I am so hungry!
-John! -Yeah.
-You made it. -Yeah.
Dude, I can't believe you made it, man.
translation.zh:
‎-你来了
‎-是啊 ‎太好了 伙计

translation.en: It's been so long!
Yeah, well, I mean, LJ and I planned the thing, so--
translation.zh:
‎是啊 我和拉拉简计划了这件事
‎所以…

translation.en: -Glad you could come. -Now we're just waiting for Chris.
translation.zh:
‎-我很高兴你们能来
‎-现在只差克里斯了

translation.en: So I guess my invitation got lost in the mail?
Oh, my God. It's Gen and Peter! Just like old times.
translation.zh: ‎我的天 吉和彼得 就像之前一样

translation.en: We doin' this or... or what?
translation.zh: ‎我们到底要不要挖时空胶囊？

translation.en: Why are you, uh, comin' from the river?
I just buried a dead body.
Yeah, you're next!
-Whoa, okay, calm down, Chris. -[Chris laughing]
translation.zh:
‎-好了 冷静 克里斯
‎-我来帮你拿着

translation.en: -Let me take this. You got it. -Oh, thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-好了 冷静 克里斯
‎-我来帮你拿着 ‎-谢谢
‎-不客气

translation.en: My shovel. I don't trust you with this thing.
translation.zh: ‎铲子给我 这东西在你手里我不放心

translation.en: -Remember where we buried this thing? -Um, you need some help?
translation.zh:
‎-你们需要帮忙吗？
‎-还记得我们埋时空胶囊的时候吗？

translation.en: No, we're good, dude. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎不 不用 伙计 谢谢你

translation.en: [Trevor] It's about here, yeah?
[Peter] That's not how you eat a cupcake.
[Trevor] No, look at that! She ate it from the bottom up.
translation.zh: ‎不 快看啊！她喜欢从最下面开始吃

translation.en: [Chris] You know what? She's saving the best for last!
translation.zh:
‎你们知道吗？
‎她是要把最好吃的部分留到最后

translation.en: That's the way to do it.
Hey. Why didn't you ask me to bring the pizza?
All right, let's bust this bad boy open!
translation.zh: ‎好了 我们快把它打开吧！

translation.en: Starting with yours truly.
-Who put this in? -I did.
It's just a bracelet.
It's not just a bracelet, I mean,
translation.zh: ‎那不是普通的手链 我是说

translation.en: that piece of string was the most valuable thing in your life.
translation.zh: ‎这串珠子是你这辈子最宝贵的东西

translation.en: I guess.
Baseball.
-I am guessing you put that in. -Yeah, that was me.
translation.zh:
‎-我猜是你放进去的
‎-对 是我

translation.en: This is when I hit a home run at Claremont Park.
translation.zh: ‎这是我在可莱蒙特公园本垒打时的球

translation.en: Wait, I remember that! You came running off the field
translation.zh: ‎等一下 我记得这件事 你跑下球场

translation.en: and then you kissed me in front of your mom. Remember that?
translation.zh: ‎当着我妈的面亲吻我 你还记得吗？

translation.en: Uh, no. No, I don't remember that.
[Trevor] All right. Yep, that's mine.
Ah, yes, the Linkin Park concert at the Crystal Ballroom.
translation.zh:
‎对 是张林肯公园在水晶宴会厅
‎演唱会的门票

translation.en: -[Chris scoffs] Linkin Park? Nerd. -What?
translation.zh:
‎-林肯公园？真是个呆子
‎-你说什么？

translation.en: Linkin Park slaps.
Hey, McClaren, remember this? This is when you hopped on the bandwagon,
translation.zh:
‎麦克拉伦 还记得这个帽子吗？
‎那时你为了赶上潮流

translation.en: -and wore this hat every single day. -Oh, my God.
Wait, Lara Jean, didn't you get a Seahawks T-shirt
translation.zh:
‎等一下 拉拉简 你当时
‎不是买了件海鹰队的T恤

translation.en: 'cause you were trying to impress John?
If that's true, that's really cute. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎-没有啊
‎-如果这是真的 那你真是太可爱了

translation.en: Hey, uh, McClaren, remember when you had that stutter?
translation.zh:
‎麦克拉伦
‎你还记得你当初说话结巴吗？

translation.en: No... I just, I noticed you don't have it anymore.
translation.zh: ‎我只是注意到你现在说话不结巴了

translation.en: Yeah, well, dude, thank you. Appreciate it.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 伙计 谢了 感谢你的夸奖

translation.en: I'm sure that my speech therapist
would love to know that her methods were successful. [chuckling]
translation.zh: ‎知道她的方法很成功 一定会很开心

translation.en: It's all good.
This is to future Chris.
Well, that's me. [laughs]
Whoa. Ha!
Genius then...
genius now.
I don't know about that. I think a genius would know the time value of money.
translation.zh:
‎这可说不准 我觉得天才
‎肯定会知道金钱的时间价值

translation.en: You know how like a 20 dollar bill now is actually worth less
than it was six years ago.
-You really got me. -I know.
translation.zh:
‎-的确有道理
‎-我知道 多谢

translation.en: Mm-hmm. You're the last one left. What's inside?
translation.zh:
‎-的确有道理
‎-我知道 多谢 ‎你是最后一个 里面还有什么？

translation.en: Um, well, it's empty.
Impossible. You put something in there. We all did.
translation.zh:
‎不可能 你肯定往里面放了东西
‎我们都放了

translation.en: Well, I don't really know what to tell you because there's nothing in there.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道该怎么跟你们说
‎但里面就是空的

translation.en: Uh, does anyone want the last slice?
Too slow.
-What? -It's getting too crowded in here.
-[Trevor] Same. -Yeah, I'm out.
I can stick around and help you clean up if you want.
translation.zh: ‎我可以留下来跟你一起清理

translation.en: -I got it. -[John Ambrose] Oh, dude,
it's cool. I mean, I kinda helped make the mess. But it's fine, I don't mind--
translation.zh:
‎没事的 这些垃圾算是我制造的
‎但没关系 我不介意…

translation.en: No, man. I think I can handle helping my girlfriend clean up.
translation.zh:
‎不用 伙计 我觉得我可以
‎帮我女朋友清理这里

translation.en: Thank you, though.
I'll go down. You wanna hand me stuff?
translation.zh: ‎那我下去了 你能递给我东西吗？

translation.en: Okay.
I'll see you tomorrow.
Sure.
Why didn't you tell McClaren that you and I are together?
translation.zh: ‎你为何没告诉麦克拉伦我们是恋人？

translation.en: Well, I wanted to. I tried to. There just was never a good time.
translation.zh:
‎我想跟他说来着 我试过
‎但就是没有合适的机会

translation.en: Yeah, there's usually not, when you're flirting.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 调情的时候
‎怎么会有合适的机会

translation.en: Well, we weren't flirting. So...
Well, next time you need pizza, just ask me. I'll get it for you.
translation.zh:
‎下次你要是需要披萨
‎直接跟我说 我会带过来

translation.en: What is it with you and pizza?
It's not about pizza.
If he brings the pizza then it looks like you two threw the party.
translation.zh:
‎如果他带披萨来
‎就会让人觉得派对是你俩举办的

translation.en: It sort of was.
You can't do that, Lara Jean.
Not when you have a boyfriend. Doesn't look right.
translation.zh: ‎尤其在你有男朋友的时候 那样不对

translation.en: Oh, right.
So, like, inviting your ex-girlfriend to your current girlfriend's party.
translation.zh:
‎所以邀请前女友参加现女友的派对
‎就可以了？

translation.en: I did not invite her! Like, officially. I...
translation.zh: ‎我没有邀请她！没有正式邀请过

translation.en: -I might've mentioned it. -Oh, yeah? When?
translation.zh:
‎-我或许提了一嘴
‎-是吗？什么时候？

translation.en: I don't know.
Why does it matter? You're the one who arranged the pizza.
translation.zh: ‎这重要吗？是你安排了让他带披萨来

translation.en: -Okay, we're going around in circles. -Well, it's not supposed to be like this.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧 我们陷入死循环了
‎-事情本不该这样的

translation.en: -Then, how's it supposed to be? -I don't know. Not like this though.
translation.zh:
‎-那应该是怎样的？
‎-我不知道 反正不是这样

translation.en: Does that mean you wanna break up?
Wait, what? No! Why would you say that?
translation.zh:
‎等一下 什么？
‎不是的 你为何那么说？

translation.en: I don't know.
Is that why you didn't tell John about us? So you'd keep your options open?
translation.zh:
‎这是你没跟约翰说
‎我们的事的原因吗？你想接着挑人？

translation.en: No! That's not the reason at all.
Okay, fine! Ever since we started dating for real, I don't know how to act.
translation.zh:
‎好吧！自从我们真正开始约会
‎我就不知道该怎么办

translation.en: I didn't read the girlfriend's handbook.
Girlfriend's handbook? Uh... what does that mean?
Like, little stuff. Like I remember Gen used to dress up for your games.
translation.zh:
‎就是一些小事 我记得吉
‎经常在你比赛的时候盛装打扮

translation.en: -Am I supposed to do that? -It's not just Gen.
translation.zh:
‎-我也该那么做吗？
‎-不仅仅是吉那么做

translation.en: Okay, all the girlfriends do that.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 所有的女朋友都会那么做

translation.en: Okay, so, do you want me to?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 那你希望我那么做吗？

translation.en: I mean, no, not if you don't want to.
translation.zh: ‎不啊 你要是不愿意就不用

translation.en: It would be nice, it would show that you care.
translation.zh:
‎虽然你那么做比较贴心
‎这表示你在乎我

translation.en: Oh, like sending a serenade to someone on Valentine's Day, maybe?
translation.zh:
‎或许就像在情人节那天
‎派人去给某人唱小夜曲？

translation.en: I... I didn't think that was your style. I mean... [sighs]
Well, it's not my style.
Okay, so...
Let's never fight again, okay?
[softly] Okay.
I got this.
This way.
You have quite the ability to remain sneakily silent.
translation.zh: ‎你很擅长做什么事都不搞出大动静

translation.en: I know I should've told you about me and Peter.
translation.zh:
‎我知道我该早点告诉你
‎我跟彼得的事的

translation.en: It's okay.
Lara Jean, I...
I was just embarrassed.
'Cause I... I read it all wrong.
It's totally my fault.
I'm sorry.
Since we're, um... Since we're coming clean
about stuff...
You know how you call me John Ambrose?
translation.zh:
‎你知道你一直叫我
‎约翰安布罗斯吗？

translation.en: Everyone calls you that.
I know.
It's because of you.
What?
Before sixth grade, pretty much everybody called me John.
translation.zh: ‎六年级之前 几乎所有人都叫我约翰

translation.en: And then I met you, and you called me John Ambrose
translation.zh: ‎然后我认识了你 ‎你叫我约翰安布罗斯

translation.en: and said how it was cool that we both went by our first and middle names.
translation.zh:
‎说我们两个都让别人叫我们的
‎名字和中间名是很酷的事

translation.en: I didn't wanna correct you,
I liked how we had something in common.
So I started telling people to call me John Ambrose.
translation.zh:
‎所以我开始告诉别人
‎让他们叫我约翰安布罗斯

translation.en: Wow.
I don't know what to say.
Are we good, John...
Ambrose?
We've always been good.
Lara...
Jean.
[Lara Jean] Are we doing Brussels sprouts this year?

translation.en: Ah, nobody really ate them last year.
Kitty says Fakesgiving's all about the potatoes anyway.

‎反正基蒂说假恩节的时候
‎我们基本都是在吃土豆

translation.en: Okay. Then, I think we're good.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 那我们就都买齐了

translation.en: On second thought, I'll get us some Brussels.

translation.en: -Hi. -What you doing?
[Trina] You know, just...
making a soup.
-Ah, these are good. -Yes, yeah, those are... those...

‎-这些食材不错
‎-对 它们都很美味

translation.en: But, there he was,
laughing nervously with his hands in his pockets.

translation.en: He looks a little... hopeless.
-Hi. -Hi.
I was supposed to get some Brussels sprouts but I got distracted...

translation.en: -uh... for our... -Ah. I see.
translation.zh:
‎我本来要拿点抱子甘蓝 但分了心… ‎-我明白了
‎-为我们的…

translation.en: -Fakesgiving. -Fakesgiving.
It's like regular Thanksgiving, but it's in March, it's a family tradition.
translation.zh:
‎跟普通的感恩节一样
‎但是在三月举行 这算是家庭传统

translation.en: Oh, my God, that's so fun.
You should come.
[Dan] Yeah.
Oh, well, I-I don't wanna...
You don't wanna wait till November for turkey.

translation.en: [Dan] Right? You wanna come?
-Yeah, count me in. -Okay.
I'll, uh, I'll text ya the deets.
[giggling] Okay.
-No one says that. -That's some nice lingo. [clears throat]
translation.zh:
‎-现在没人这么说话了
‎-他这么说还挺逗的

translation.en: -I'm glad you're coming. -Me too.
But there's something that I should tell you.
You know that valentine that Dad sent you?
translation.zh: ‎你知道爸爸送你的情人节卡片吧？

translation.en: Kitty made that.
Wait, so you're telling me that the valentine
translation.zh: ‎等一下 所以你是在告诉我

translation.en: that was addressed to Mrs. Rothschild in glitter glue...
translation.zh:
‎粘着闪光胶粉的那封
‎寄给罗斯柴尔德夫人的情人节卡片…

translation.en: ...wasn't from your Dad?
Well, that is a plot twist.
Wait, did Dad get Brussels sprouts?

translation.en: He did not get the Brussels sprouts.
[Lara Jean] Dad.
[Dan] What?
-Get more. -Okay.
-That's not enough. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-再拿些 那些不够
‎-好 ‎没问题

translation.en: [Trina] Mm-hmm.
[Dan] All right.
Is something wrong with the green beans?
Uh, they're just a little un-Covey.
No? I mean everything else on the table looks like it could be

translation.en: in one of my mom's food and wine magazines.
translation.zh: ‎都像是我妈的美食红酒杂志上的佳肴

translation.en: -He noticed. -[Dan] He's got a good eye.
It's silly, we do a little thing where I get a can of green beans.

translation.en: No, it's symbolic. I mean, it's kind of, um, for Mom.
translation.zh:
‎不 这是有象征意义的
‎我是说 这算是为了纪念妈妈

translation.en: Okay, it sounds like there's a story there. Is there a story?
translation.zh:
‎好的 听起来这背后还有个故事
‎是有个故事吗？

translation.en: Oh, when I was in college, I got invited to a Thanksgiving party in a dorm room.
translation.zh:
‎我上大学时 有次被邀请
‎去一个宿舍参加感恩节派对

translation.en: But the weird thing is, it was the middle of March,
translation.zh: ‎但奇怪的事 当时是在三月中旬

translation.en: and the girl hosting it was the coolest girl I ever saw.
translation.zh: ‎派对的组织者是我见过的最酷的女孩

translation.en: Evie, their mom.
And she thought it was unfair that the two best holidays of the year
translation.zh: ‎她认为每年最好的两个节日都在年底

translation.en: were at the end of the year, right on top of each other and
translation.zh: ‎一个接着另一个 这不公平 所以

translation.en: we should just spread the love a little bit
and have a potluck for good ol' March.
Right, and at that potluck, when everyone made homemade goods,
translation.zh:
‎对 那次百味餐上
‎大家都带了自制的菜

translation.en: Dad brought
-canned green beans. -Canned green beans.
-Right. -[all chuckling]
And she made fun of him the entire night.
She made so much fun of me, I thought she was really mad at me.
translation.zh:
‎她不停地嘲笑我
‎我还以为她真的很生我的气

translation.en: But after, her roommate told you that that's just how she flirts, right?
translation.zh:
‎但后来 她室友告诉你
‎那就是她的调情方式 对吧？

translation.en: See, she teases you.
-Is that... -Nope.
All right, well that is a really sweet tradition.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 这真是一个很温馨的传统

translation.en: -Thanks for sharing that story. -Yeah, thanks.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你们分享给我这个故事
‎-是啊 谢谢

translation.en: Oh, there's one other tradition.
Yes. Newcomers have to eat the beans.
translation.zh: ‎对 新来的人必须吃豆子

translation.en: -Oh, I don't think that's necessary. -Oh, it is very necessary.
translation.zh:
‎-我觉得没这个必要
‎-非常有必要

translation.en: Mom made you eat them, and Margot made Josh, so...

‎妈妈让你吃过 玛戈特让乔希吃过
‎所以…

translation.en: Oh, well then, yeah. [clears throat] That sounds pretty set in stone.

translation.en: Okay.
Bottoms up.
I don't mind. I like canned goods.

translation.en: -That makes so much sense. -[laughs]
To Eve.
Evie.
Huh?
Nice?
You know what? It's not terrible.
-Right? -There you have it.
-[Trina] That's what that is. -Can you pass the cranberry sauce?

‎-是吗？
‎-我就说嘛 ‎能把蔓越莓酱递给我吗？

translation.en: I'll cut some turkey. Will you take this, hon?

‎我来切火鸡
‎你能拿下这个吗 亲爱的？

translation.en: -Yeah, of course. -Okay.
[Dan] Okay, let's see here.
-You've done this before, right? -Dad, that's not totally necessary.

‎-你之前就这么做过 对吧？

translation.en: But not today.
That last one hurt.
LJ! Like your look. Pete's gonna love it!

translation.en: Dude, hey. Um...
What?
I don't know how to tell you this.
Well, just say it.
I just saw Peter and Gen together.

translation.en: They seemed close.
Close like, um, how close?
Hi.
Were you with Gen today?
Uh, yeah. Yeah.
Here we go again.
Listen, she was upset because there's some
things happening with her mom and her dad

translation.en: and she just wanted to talk to someone who understands.

translation.en: -That's it. -That's it?
Kavinsky! Let's go!
Peter, that is everything.
She is trying to prove that no matter what is going on in your life,

translation.en: when she calls, you come running.
And when push comes to shove, you pick her,

translation.en: you pick her every single time.
That's bullshit.
Okay? I pick you.
Lara Jean, when there was an actual choice, I picked you.

‎拉拉简 当初我面临真正的选择时
‎我选了你

She took that video, I told her that if she ever hurt you again then we were done.

‎视频是她拍的 我告诉她如果她再敢
‎伤害你 我跟她就一刀两断

‎-所以你早就知道？
‎-对 拉拉简…

translation.en: You denied it.

‎-可你之前说你不知道
‎-因为你们俩那时

translation.en: Because you guys already have so much bad blood between you two.

‎-可你之前说你不知道
‎-因为你们俩那时 ‎关系已经够糟糕的了

To protect her. Like always.
No. To protect you.
-[Trevor] Peter. -Covey.
Seriously. Let's go.
Sorry, LJ, but, yeah.

How did she know?
-What? -That night.
I said I was going to bed. And Gen knew exactly where you were. How did she know?

‎我说我要回去睡觉了
‎吉却知道你在哪 她怎么知道的？

‎你在热水浴池那里
‎等的人是她 对吧？

You and I weren't, like, really together yet.

And if I hadn't come down to find you,

‎你就会和吉在一起
‎我们也不会成为男女朋友

Don't say that. You don't mean that.

‎没错 我觉得我们都做出了

translation.en: Right.
I miss you, Mom.
I wish you could tell me what to do.

translation.en: It's a quarter to eight.
I know.
Okay.

Do you want this back?
Yeah.
Yeah, sure.
-I can't do it. -Let me help.
[Lara Jean] I thought that if Peter and I were together,

translation.en: the two of us could get through anything.

translation.en: I was wrong.
I don't know if that means our love wasn't true,

‎我不知道这是否意味着
‎我们之间不是真爱

‎但我可以确定的是
‎我们对彼此不够坦诚

♪ And girls just wanna have fun ♪
Hey.
Hey.
I guess you know Peter and I broke up.

translation.en: Yup, I heard something about that.
Part of the reason was because when he was with me,
translation.zh: ‎一部分原因是因为我和他在一起时

translation.en: I always thought he was thinking about you.
translation.zh: ‎总是觉得他一直都在想着你

translation.en: And that I would never be good enough.
I was convinced that he was never really gonna get over you.
And then I realized that
the person who couldn't get over you...
was me.
You probably don't remember this, but...
translation.zh: ‎你或许已经不记得了 但…

translation.en: I put this in the time capsule because it's our friendship bracelet.

‎我把这串手链放进时空胶囊

translation.en: You know, you're way off about Peter.

translation.en: He's crazy about you.
He tells me that himself.
And the reason that I call him is not to hurt you.

My parents are splitting up right now,
and it's just really confusing.
Peter's been through it, you know?

translation.en: I hid this over there because
translation.zh: ‎我当时把手链藏了起来 是因为

‎我放进去了同样的东西

It's the connection between two people that can't be severed.

‎说的是两个人之间永远不可能
‎被切断的关联

translation.en: Even when love turns to hate,

translation.en: Gen and I have jung.
Part of us will always be tied to one another.
If I want to move forward,

translation.en: Oh, there you are. Come in, sweetie.

translation.en: You look amazing.
And you look like a girl not ready for the ball.

I guess you won't be needing this, then.

translation.en: Sort of a shame that you don't want to dress up.

look so lovely on you.
But, there you go.
Stormy.
Give me the dress.

Wow.
Hi.
You look great.
Thanks.
-I'm glad I decided to dress up. -[chuckles]

translation.en: Me too.
-It's my dad's. Yeah. -Oh, great.

‎-这是我爸的衣服 对
‎-好极了

translation.en: -[giggling] -Shall we?
-Yes. -Yeah.
"It's my dad's"?
Come out from behind that table and come and enjoy yourselves.

‎别一直在桌子后面站着了
‎出来好好玩一下

translation.en: These people are perfectly capable of serving their own punch.

translation.en: We're supposed to be working.
Convince her, would you?
Come on, ask her to dance.

I... wanted to ask you to the sixth grade dance.

translation.en: Yeah.
I actually went to your house.
I gathered up a whole bunch of sticks,

translation.zh:
‎后面还带了个问号
‎对 就在你窗户外面

I'm pretty sure he--
Yeah, I'm pretty sure he thought that I was
translation.zh: ‎对 我很确定他把我当成

So he gave me ten bucks,
and I just, I got super nervous.
So I went home.
I can't believe that.
Yeah.
It's actually-- It's kind of embarrassing now.

translation.en: I probably shouldn't have even told you that, I--

translation.en: I know you're with Kavinsky.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你跟凯文斯基在一起

translation.en: Him and I are...
Oh.
Are you okay?
Let's get some air.
Wow.
Come on.
God, I can't believe it's snowing this late in the year.

probably melt by morning.
But-- [gasps]
Okay!
-Okay. Okay. -No.
-You know where this is going, right? -No! No, no, no. No!
translation.zh:
‎-你知道我会怎么做 对吧？
‎-不要！

translation.en: What are you doing?
[John Ambrose] Snow angels.
Are you cold?
-Yeah, I'm freezing. -Okay.
Come on.
It's Peter.
I'm sorry.
Lara Jean.
Are you all right, honey?
We kissed.
But, I...
I wanted him to be someone else.
And now I feel like I ruined everything.
No, no. You're too hard on yourself.
translation.zh: ‎不 不是的 ‎你对自己太苛刻了

translation.en: Sometimes you have to kiss the wrong man

I have.
More times than a lady should admit.

‎但万一现在已经太迟了呢？
‎我是说 我和彼得 我们分手了

translation.en: So what? Unbreak it.
If that's what you want.
And if he doesn't?
If he doesn't what?
Want me.
Well...
that will hurt like hell.
[sobs] Yeah.
Okay. Uh, Stormy?
Mm-hmm.
Can I bring you back your dress tomorrow?
No.
Because it's yours.
-Thank you. -Mm-hmm.
I have... I have to go.
Go.
Peter.
You said you didn't like driving in the snow, right?
translation.zh: ‎你说过不喜欢在下雪天开车 对吧？

translation.en: Break my heart, Covey.
Break my heart into a thousand pieces.
Do whatever you want.
I love you.
I love you, too.
[Lara Jean] When you light a lantern and send it into the sky,
translation.zh: ‎当你往天空里放孔明灯的时候

translation.en: you're supposed to make a wish.
I thought I wanted a promise that Peter and I would never hurt each other.
translation.zh:
‎我以为我会想许下
‎我和彼得永远不会伤害彼此的愿望

translation.zh: ‎我想要一样根本不存在的东西

translation.en: I wanted happily ever after.

translation.en: But I know now that I don't want a love in half measures.
translation.zh: ‎但我现在明白我不想要残缺的爱了

translation.en: I want it all.
And to have it all, we have to risk it all.

‎为了彻底体验爱情
‎我们就得赌上所有

translation.en: If I could do it over, I wouldn't change a thing.

‎因为是我们全部的经历
‎让我们走到了这一步

translation.en: This is our story.
And we're still at the beginning.
